titles.title: Hagerman Fossil Beds National Monument Boundary Revision Act of 1993
A bill to revise the boundaries of the Hagerman Fossil Beds National Monument, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources
committee.subcommittee: Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

bill.summary: 9/21/1993--Introduced. Hagerman Fossil Beds National Monument Boundary Revision Act of 1993 - Amends the Arizona-Idaho Conservation Act of 1988 to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to acquire specified lands for inclusion within the Hagerman Fossil Beds National Monument.
